This is the first game I have played where uploading pictures can be needed, and my other hobby has a site where I can upload pictures easily...

So, how can I upload pictures for KSP?

Attachments don't work at this time.

You need to upload your pictures to an image hosting site like imgur and then post the link here using the [ img ] tags.

Just click 'reply with quote' on any post with pictures in it to see how it should look.
Uploading to photobucket or flickr then use the tags to display the pic in your thread.

Thanks

(looks for like button)

I'm too used to a forum that looks like this...

But has a like button...

The star-shaped button will add to the user's "reputation" score, but there is no voting mechanism for posts.

I also recommend Imgur for image-hosting.
